sentences.en: Dick Diver is the epitome of this world.
sentences.cn: 迪克·戴弗是这个世界的写照.

sentences.en: Epitome standard includes market shares, market centralization degree, enterprise scales, technique innovation abilities etc.
sentences.cn: 反竞争企业合并的认定标准可以分为概括性标准和具体标准两类,其中具体标准包括市场份额 、 市场集中度 、 企业规模 、 技术创新能力等等.

sentences.en: For example, commonweal establishment is a definite epitome and abstract with concision.
sentences.cn: 比如公益设施,就是对事物性质的明确概括和提炼,简洁明了、言简意赅.

sentences.en: GE is, at first blush the epitome of a blue - chip name.
sentences.cn: 乍一看来,通用电气简直就是蓝筹股的代名词.

sentences.en: He is the epitome of a modern young man.
sentences.cn: 他是现代青年男子的典范。

sentences.en: He is the epitome of diligence.
He is the epitome of goodness.
He was the very epitome of evil.
I love Mr. Bean… So fitting that he is in the opening. The epitome of dyr British humour.
sentences.cn: 我爱憨豆先生……他出现在开幕式中真是太适合了。是英国冷幽默的象征。

sentences.en: Maureen was the epitome of sophistication.
sentences.cn: 莫琳是个典型的老油条。

sentences.en: Noah Townsend was fully up to the occasion , the epitome of a seasoned family physician.
sentences.cn: 诺亚·汤森特那天不负重托, 全然一副恰值盛年的医生的派头.

sentences.en: She looked the epitome of elegance.
sentences.cn: 她看上去像是优雅的典范。

sentences.en: Such a broad epitome and conclusion is more difficult to understand.
sentences.cn: 这么宽泛的概括与总结,反而令人很难理解.

sentences.en: The Dorchester Hotel is the epitome of luxury in the heart of London.
sentences.cn: 多切斯特酒店是伦敦市中心豪华奢侈的缩影。

sentences.en: These are not people you are the epitome of an ugly duckling?
sentences.cn: 这些名人们不都是丑小鸭的缩影 吗 ?

sentences.en: This handbook is a neat epitome of everyday hygiene.
sentences.cn: 这本手册概括了日常卫生的要点.

trans.tran_cn: 缩影，典型的人或事物，（书、演讲等的）摘要
trans.tran_en: the best possible example of something
